leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 结构生物-结构预测与评估生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预测→精修→对齐→质量评估→可视化
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 推理框架 + 结构工具 + 可视化

tools.name: Long Ranger
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis pipeline for 10x Genomics Linked-Read data
tools.detailed_description: A set of analysis pipelines that processes Chromium-prepared sequencing data to align reads, call variants, and phase SNPs, indels, and structural variants.

tools.name: ZEAL
tools.one_line_profile: Shape-based protein structure alignment tool using Zernike descriptors
tools.detailed_description: Software to perform shape-based protein structure alignment, utilizing Zernike descriptors for efficient comparison of protein shapes.

tools.name: JAR3D
tools.one_line_profile: Java-based alignment of RNA using 3D structure
tools.detailed_description: A tool for aligning RNA sequences to 3D structural motifs, aiding in the identification and analysis of recurrent RNA 3D structures.

tools.name: GraphClust-2
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for structural clustering of RNA secondary structures
tools.detailed_description: A scalable pipeline for clustering RNA sequences based on their secondary structures, utilizing graph kernel methods for efficient structural comparison.

tools.name: DeeplyTough
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for structural comparison of protein binding sites
tools.detailed_description: A convolutional neural network-based method for quantifying the similarity of protein binding sites, enabling structure-based drug design tasks.

tools.name: CesiumJS
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source JavaScript library for world-class 3D globes and maps
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library for creating 3D globes and 2D maps in a web browser without a plugin, widely used for geospatial scientific visualization.

tools.name: DALI-SLAM
tools.one_line_profile: Degeneracy-aware LiDAR-inertial SLAM system
tools.detailed_description: A LiDAR-inertial SLAM system designed to handle degeneracy in environments, featuring distortion correction and multi-constraint pose graph optimization.

tools.name: ICARUS
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible protein structural alignment based on Protein Units
tools.detailed_description: A tool for flexible protein structure alignment that uses Protein Units (PUs) to handle structural variations and flexibility.

tools.name: PoincareMSA
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of multiple sequence alignments using Poincaré maps
tools.detailed_description: A strategy for visualizing and interpreting multiple sequence alignments (MSA) using Poincaré maps to detect hierarchical organization in protein families.

tools.name: Kluster
tools.one_line_profile: Structural clustering algorithm for CBP60 protein family
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a novel structural clustering algorithm developed for the CBP60-DB, an AlphaFold-predicted plant kingdom-wide database.

tools.name: tmscoring
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the TM-score structural similarity metric
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to calculate the TM-score (Template Modeling score) for assessing the topological similarity of protein structures.

tools.name: snakedali
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake implementation of protein structure alignment software DaliLite v5
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow wrapper for the DaliLite v5 software, facilitating automated protein structure alignment pipelines.

tools.name: ssu-align
tools.one_line_profile: Structural alignment of SSU rRNA sequences
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the structural alignment of Small Subunit (SSU) ribosomal RNA sequences, useful in phylogenetic and structural analysis.

tools.name: Organisms
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic algorithm for global optimization of nanoclusters
tools.detailed_description: The Otago Research Genetic Algorithm for Nanoclusters, Including Structural Methods and Similarity (Organisms) program is designed to globally optimise nanoclusters and nanoparticles.

tools.name: REGAL
tools.one_line_profile: Representation learning-based graph alignment using structural embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A framework for graph alignment based on implicit matrix factorization and structural embeddings, applicable to network alignment tasks in various domains including bioinformatics.

tools.name: DaLiTI
tools.one_line_profile: Degeneration-aware LiDAR-Thermal-Inertial SLAM system
tools.detailed_description: A SLAM system integrating LiDAR, Thermal, and Inertial sensors, designed to be robust against degeneration in challenging environments.

tools.name: DALiuGE
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven workflow execution engine for radio astronomy
tools.detailed_description: The DALiuGE (Data Activated Liu Graph Engine) Execution Engine is a workflow management system designed for the high-throughput data processing requirements of radio astronomy.

tools.name: Daline
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven Power Flow Linearization Toolbox for Power Systems
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for data-driven power flow linearization in power systems research and education. It facilitates the analysis and modeling of power grids.

tools.name: CLoNe
tools.one_line_profile: Clustering tool for biomolecular structural ensembles
tools.detailed_description: CLoNe is a clustering tool designed for biomolecular structural ensembles and general data. It is particularly useful for analyzing molecular dynamics simulation trajectories to identify distinct conformational states.

tools.name: LinearTurboFold
tools.one_line_profile: Linear-time algorithm for RNA structural alignment and conserved structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: An end-to-end linear-time algorithm for structural alignment and conserved structure prediction of RNA homologs. It enables the analysis of long RNA sequences and multiple sequences efficiently.

tools.name: MISA SCD
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel Stochastic Cluster Dynamics Simulation for Reactor Materials
tools.detailed_description: MISA SCD is a parallel stochastic cluster dynamics simulation software designed for studying the evolution of defects in reactor structural materials under irradiation.

tools.name: sarst
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient protein structural alignment search algorithm
tools.detailed_description: SARST (Structure Alignment by Ramachandran Stabilized Torsion) is an algorithm for efficient protein structural alignment search, utilizing Ramachandran codes to represent protein structures.

tools.name: RNA_assessment
tools.one_line_profile: Basic RNA 3D structure comparison metrics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and scripts for assessing RNA 3D structures, including metrics like Interaction Network Fidelity (INF), Deformation Index (DI), and RMSD. Developed for the RNA-Puzzles challenges.

tools.name: MUM&Co
tools.one_line_profile: Structural Variation detection using Whole Genome Alignment
tools.detailed_description: MUM&Co is a bash script that leverages Whole Genome Alignment information provided by MUMmer (v4) to detect Structural Variations (SVs) such as insertions, deletions, inversions, and translocations.

tools.name: mican
tools.one_line_profile: Non-sequential structural alignment program for protein structures
tools.detailed_description: A tool for protein structure alignment that handles non-sequential alignments, useful for detecting structural similarities in proteins with different topologies.

tools.name: SlicerRT
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source toolkit for radiation therapy research within 3D Slicer
tools.detailed_description: An extension for 3D Slicer providing tools for radiation therapy research, including DICOM-RT import/export, dose volume histograms, and structure comparison.

tools.name: Valx
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for extracting numeric lab test comparisons from clinical text
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to extract and structure numeric laboratory test comparison statements from unstructured clinical text for biomedical research.

tools.name: caretta
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple protein structure alignment and feature extraction suite
tools.detailed_description: A software suite for performing multiple protein structure alignment and extracting structural features, useful for structural biology analysis.

tools.name: geometricus
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based, alignment-free embedding approach for proteins
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating alignment-free embeddings of protein structures using moment invariants, suitable for machine learning applications in structural biology.

tools.name: cath-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure comparison tools from the CATH group
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools for protein structure comparison, including SSAP and SNAP algorithms, developed by the CATH database group.

tools.name: AGE
tools.one_line_profile: Optimal alignment of sequences with structural variants
tools.detailed_description: A tool that implements an algorithm for the optimal alignment of genomic sequences containing structural variants (SVs).

tools.name: mini3di
tools.one_line_profile: NumPy port of foldseek code for encoding protein structures to 3di
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that ports the Foldseek 3di encoding algorithm, allowing for efficient encoding of protein structures into 3di sequences for structure comparison.

tools.name: LIGSIFT
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for ligand structural alignment and virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: An open-source tool designed for the structural alignment of ligands and virtual screening applications in drug discovery.

tools.name: AnchorWave
tools.one_line_profile: Sensitive alignment of genomes with high sequence diversity
tools.detailed_description: A tool for sensitive alignment of genomes, capable of handling high sequence diversity, structural polymorphisms, and whole-genome duplication variations.

tools.name: biozernike
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure descriptors and alignment based on 3D Zernike moments
tools.detailed_description: A library for calculating 3D Zernike descriptors for protein structures and performing structural alignment based on these descriptors.

tools.name: rmsd
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to calculate Root-mean-square deviation (RMSD) of two molecules
tools.detailed_description: A Python script that calculates the Root-mean-square deviation (RMSD) of two molecules (XYZ or PDB format), using rotation to minimize the distance.

tools.name: AHoJ
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for searching APO (unbound) protein structures from HOLO (bound) forms
tools.detailed_description: A webserver and command-line tool designed to search for APO (unbound) protein structures based on HOLO (bound) forms and vice versa, aiding in the study of protein conformational changes.

tools.name: psrfits_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utility library for working with PSRFITS pulsar data files
tools.detailed_description: A C library and set of utilities for reading, writing, and manipulating pulsar data in the PSRFITS format, commonly used in radio astronomy.

tools.name: pSCAN
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and exact structural graph clustering algorithm implementation
tools.detailed_description: An efficient implementation of the pSCAN algorithm for structural graph clustering, designed to handle large-scale networks and detect clusters with overlaps. It focuses on optimizing the structural clustering of networks based on node similarity.

tools.name: dHCP_template_alignment
tools.one_line_profile: Surface alignment script for the Developing Human Connectome Project
tools.detailed_description: A script derived from the dHCP structural pipeline for aligning cortical surfaces to the dHCP surface template space. It facilitates the registration of neuroimaging data for developing human brains.

tools.name: Faiss
tools.one_line_profile: Library for efficient similarity search and clustering of dense vectors
tools.detailed_description: A library for efficient similarity search and clustering of dense vectors. It contains algorithms that search in sets of vectors of any size, up to ones that possibly do not fit in RAM. Widely used in bioinformatics for embedding search and clustering.

tools.name: LoCoHD
tools.one_line_profile: Metric for protein-protein structure comparison
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the LoCoHD (Local Composition Hellinger Distance) metric for comparing protein-protein structures. It provides a measure of similarity between protein structures based on their local composition.

tools.name: DALI Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset of synchronised audio, lyrics, and vocal notes
tools.detailed_description: A large dataset of synchronised audio, lyrics, and vocal notes designed for music information retrieval research, specifically for tasks like singing voice analysis and lyrics alignment.

tools.name: SCAN-Python
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the SCAN structural clustering algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the SCAN (Structural Clustering Algorithm for Networks) algorithm, which detects clusters, hubs, and outliers in networks based on structural similarity.

tools.name: RNAStructViz
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for visualization and comparison of RNA secondary structures
tools.detailed_description: A cross-platform GUI tool for the visualization, comparison, and analysis of RNA secondary structures. It supports various visualization modes and structural comparison tasks.

tools.name: Arctic3D
tools.one_line_profile: Clustering of protein-protein interfaces from 3D structures
tools.detailed_description: Arctic3D (Automatic Retrieval and ClusTering of Interfaces in Complexes from 3D structural information) is a tool for analyzing and clustering protein-protein interfaces based on 3D structural data.

tools.name: OpenBNSL
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Bayesian Network Structure Learning algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A unified framework for fair, reproducible, and transparent comparison of Bayesian Network Structure Learning (BNSL) algorithms. It provides implementations of various algorithms for learning the structure of Bayesian networks from data.

tools.name: HIV-1 TAR QSAR
tools.one_line_profile: QSAR models for HIV-1 TAR RNA small molecule binders
tools.detailed_description: Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship (QSAR) models developed to predict thermodynamic and kinetic binding parameters of small molecules to the HIV-1 TAR RNA model system. Includes scripts for multiple linear regression and feature selection.

tools.name: ConsAlifold
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus RNA secondary structure predictor using structural alignment
tools.detailed_description: A consensus secondary structure predictor for RNA that engages structural alignment-based error correction to improve prediction accuracy.

tools.name: ConsProb
tools.one_line_profile: Probability inference engine for RNA structural alignment
tools.detailed_description: A quick probability inference engine designed for RNA structural alignment tasks, facilitating the analysis of RNA sequence and structure conservation.

tools.name: Temporal-Action-Alignment-USFGW
tools.one_line_profile: Weakly-supervised temporal action alignment using USFGW distance
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a weakly-supervised temporal action alignment method driven by Unbalanced Spectral Fused Gromov-Wasserstein (USFGW) distance, as presented at ACMMM 2022.

tools.name: AD-Prediction-CNN
tools.one_line_profile: Alzheimer's Disease prediction using CNNs on MRI images
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning project implementing Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and transfer learning (AlexNet, 3D Autoencoder) for predicting Alzheimer's Disease from brain MRI images using ADNI data.

tools.name: cnnLSV
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant detection using CNNs and long-read alignment
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting structural variants (SVs) by encoding long-read alignment information into images and using a convolutional neural network (CNN) for classification.

tools.name: H-SRDC
tools.one_line_profile: Structurally Regularized Deep Clustering for Domain Adaptation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Towards Uncovering the Intrinsic Data Structures for Unsupervised Domain Adaptation using Structurally Regularized Deep Clustering', a method for discovering intrinsic data structures in domain adaptation tasks.

tools.name: Fundus Vessel Segmentation TBME
tools.one_line_profile: Retinal vessel segmentation using CRF and structured SVM
tools.detailed_description: A method for blood vessel segmentation in fundus images based on a discriminatively trained, fully connected conditional random field (CRF) model and structured output support vector machine.

tools.name: chocula
tools.one_line_profile: Journal-level metadata processing tool for Fatcat
tools.detailed_description: A tool for munging and processing journal-level metadata, used as part of the Fatcat project to manage scholarly publication records.

tools.name: Fatcat
tools.one_line_profile: Versioned catalog of scholarly publications
tools.detailed_description: A scalable, versioned, open catalog of bibliographic entities (papers, containers, creators, files, etc.) representing the scholarly record. It serves as a backend for archiving and accessing research outputs.

tools.name: Fatcat Scholar
tools.one_line_profile: Search interface for the Fatcat scholarly catalog
tools.detailed_description: The web search interface and discovery layer for the Fatcat catalog, allowing users to search and access millions of scholarly works preserved by the Internet Archive.

tools.name: Sandcrawler
tools.one_line_profile: Crawling and processing backend for scholarly web content
tools.detailed_description: Backend tools used by the Internet Archive for crawling, processing, and ingesting scholarly web content and metadata into the Fatcat catalog.

tools.name: SPOT-1D-LM
tools.one_line_profile: Protein property prediction using language models without alignment
tools.detailed_description: A method for predicting protein secondary and tertiary structural properties (like secondary structure, solvent accessibility, contact maps) using protein language model embeddings, achieving high accuracy without requiring multiple sequence alignments (MSA).

tools.name: SAT
tools.one_line_profile: Structural Analysis Toolkit for structural data and alignments
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the manipulation and analysis of structural data and structural alignments, likely focused on biological macromolecules or materials.

tools.name: ProteinClusterTools
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for exploring and clustering protein families
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for exploring protein families using homology-based or vector representation-based methods to generate clusters in sequence space, aiding in the analysis of protein diversity and evolution.

tools.name: SSIM
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Structural Similarity (SSIM) index
tools.detailed_description: MATLAB implementation of the Structural Similarity (SSIM) index algorithm for measuring the similarity between two images, widely used in image processing and quality assessment.

tools.name: tmtools
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for TM-align protein structure comparison algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that provides bindings for the TM-align algorithm, a standard method for protein structure alignment and comparison. It allows efficient calculation of TM-scores and structural superposition within Python workflows.

tools.name: EMBER2
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment-free protein structure prediction using language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein structures from sequences without the need for multiple sequence alignments (MSAs). It leverages protein language models to achieve fast and efficient structure prediction.

tools.name: qs-align
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable algorithm for protein quaternary structure alignment
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based tool designed for the alignment of protein quaternary structures (complexes). It addresses the computational challenges of aligning multi-chain protein assemblies to identify structural similarities.

tools.name: DeepFold
tools.one_line_profile: Learning structural motif representations for protein search
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach for learning representations of protein structural motifs. It enables efficient search and comparison of protein structures based on learned embeddings of local structural features.

tools.name: Aperture
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment-free detection of structural variations in ctDNA
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics tool for detecting structural variations (SVs) and viral integrations in circulating tumor DNA (ctDNA) using an alignment-free approach, suitable for liquid biopsy analysis.

tools.name: MSEABOARD
tools.one_line_profile: Dashboard for visualization of MSAs, trees, and structures
tools.detailed_description: A web-based interactive dashboard for visualizing and analyzing multiple sequence alignments (MSA), phylogenetic trees, and associated protein structures. It integrates various data types to facilitate comparative analysis.

tools.name: GTalign
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance protein structure alignment and search
tools.detailed_description: A CUDA-accelerated tool for high-performance protein structure alignment, superposition, and database search. It is designed to handle large-scale structural comparisons efficiently.

tools.name: EvoClustRNA
tools.one_line_profile: RNA 3D structure prediction using evolutionary information
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting RNA 3D structures by utilizing co-evolutionary information derived from multiple sequence alignments (MSAs). It aims to improve structure prediction accuracy for RNA molecules.

tools.name: Mol*
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive macromolecular visualization and analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A modern, web-based open-source toolkit for visualization and analysis of large-scale macromolecular data. It serves as a core viewer for PDB and other structural databases, supporting high-performance rendering and data delivery.

tools.name: iCn3D
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based 3D structure viewer and analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A web-based 3D viewer for visualizing and analyzing molecular structures. It supports interactive exploration of proteins, DNA/RNA, and chemicals, and allows for sharing of structural views via URLs.

tools.name: MRFy
tools.one_line_profile: Structural motif search using random fields
tools.detailed_description: A Haskell implementation for searching structural motifs in proteins using random fields and stochastic search algorithms. It provides a method for identifying structural patterns.

tools.name: 3diphy
tools.one_line_profile: Maximum likelihood structural phylogenetics using Foldseek 3Di
tools.detailed_description: An R package for performing structural phylogenetics analysis. It utilizes Foldseek's 3Di structural alphabet characters to infer phylogenetic relationships based on protein structures using maximum likelihood methods.

tools.name: NGMLR
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read mapper for PacBio and Oxford Nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: NGMLR is a long-read mapper designed to align PacBio or Oxford Nanopore (standard and ultra-long) reads to a reference genome with a focus on reads that span structural variations.

tools.name: SimSite3D
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for searching protein-ligand binding sites in 3D structures
tools.detailed_description: The SimSite3D Software tools are designed to quickly search a database of three dimensional structures, in Protein Data Bank format, with protein-ligand binding sites to determine which binding sites in the database have steric and chemical similarities to the query binding site.

tools.name: DMPfold
tools.one_line_profile: De novo protein structure prediction using iteratively predicted constraints
tools.detailed_description: De novo protein structure prediction using iteratively predicted structural constraints.

tools.name: DMPfold2
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate protein structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: Fast and accurate protein structure prediction tool, successor to DMPfold.

tools.name: USalign
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Structure Alignment of Nucleic Acids and Proteins
tools.detailed_description: Universal Structure Alignment of Monomeric and Complex Structure of Nucleic Acids and Proteins. It provides a unified framework for aligning 3D structures of macromolecules.

tools.name: PyMod 3
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for sequence similarity searches and homology modeling
tools.detailed_description: PyMod 3 - sequence similarity searches, multiple sequence/structure alignments, and homology modeling within PyMOL.

tools.name: RUPEE
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate purely geometric protein structure search
tools.detailed_description: RUPEE: A fast and accurate purely geometric protein structure search tool.

tools.name: reseek
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure alignment and search algorithm
tools.detailed_description: Protein structure alignment and search algorithm.

tools.name: rcsb-embedding-model
tools.one_line_profile: Embedding model for structure similarity search
tools.detailed_description: Embedding model for structure similarity search, likely used for retrieving similar protein structures from RCSB PDB.

tools.name: DeepAlign
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure analysis toolkit
tools.detailed_description: DeepAlign: the protein structure analysis toolkit, focusing on alignment and comparison.

tools.name: esmologs
tools.one_line_profile: Local homology search powered by ESM-2 language model
tools.detailed_description: Local homology search powered by ESM-2 language model, foldseek, hhsuite, and hmmer. It leverages protein language models for sensitive homology detection.

tools.name: lncRNA-folding
tools.one_line_profile: Secondary structure prediction of long non-coding RNA
tools.detailed_description: Repository associated with the review and experimental comparison of existing approaches for secondary structure prediction of long non-coding RNA. While primarily a benchmark, it provides scripts/framework for running these predictions.

tools.name: MMseqs2
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra fast and sensitive search and clustering suite
tools.detailed_description: MMseqs2: ultra fast and sensitive search and clustering suite for protein and nucleotide sequences. Widely used for metagenomics and generating MSAs for structure prediction.

tools.name: MMseqs2-App
tools.one_line_profile: Desktop application for MMseqs2
tools.detailed_description: MMseqs2 app to run on your workstation or servers, providing a GUI/interface for the MMseqs2 suite.

tools.name: map_align
tools.one_line_profile: Contact map alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: Tool for aligning protein contact maps, useful for detecting structural similarity even with low sequence identity.

tools.name: Structty
tools.one_line_profile: Terminal-based viewer for PDB protein structure files
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight terminal viewer for PDB files, allowing users to visualize protein structures directly in the command line interface.

tools.name: FoldDisco
tools.one_line_profile: Fast indexing and search of discontinuous motifs in protein structures
tools.detailed_description: A tool for fast indexing and searching of discontinuous motifs in protein structures, enabling efficient structural mining.

tools.name: FoldMason
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple Protein Structure Alignment at Scale
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing multiple protein structure alignment efficiently at scale, suitable for large datasets.

tools.name: Foldseek
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and sensitive comparisons of large structure sets
tools.detailed_description: Enables fast and sensitive comparisons of large protein structure sets, revolutionizing structural similarity search.

tools.name: Unicore
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based core gene phylogeny with Foldseek and ProstT5
tools.detailed_description: Universal and efficient structure-based core gene phylogeny inference tool leveraging Foldseek and ProstT5.

tools.name: DALIGNER
tools.one_line_profile: Local alignment tool for DNA reads
tools.detailed_description: Finds all significant local alignments between reads, widely used in genome assembly pipelines.

tools.name: SPfast
tools.one_line_profile: Fast geometric protein structure comparison
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation for fast geometric comparison of protein structures.

tools.name: nRex
tools.one_line_profile: Germline and somatic variant calling tool
tools.detailed_description: Performs germline and somatic single-nucleotide, short indel, and structural variant calling.

tools.name: clfd
tools.one_line_profile: Smart RFI removal algorithms for pulsar data
tools.detailed_description: Implements smart Radio Frequency Interference (RFI) removal algorithms to be used on folded pulsar search and timing data.

tools.name: pyProCT
tools.one_line_profile: Cluster analysis software for structural proteomics
tools.detailed_description: Open source cluster analysis software especially adapted for jobs related with structural proteomics and trajectory analysis.

tools.name: pyRMSD
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient RMSD calculations for large structure sets
tools.detailed_description: A Python package tuned for fast collective RMSD calculations and pairwise RMSD matrices of large sets of structures.

tools.name: scASDC
tools.one_line_profile: Attention enhanced structural deep clustering for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A structural deep clustering method for scRNA-seq cell clustering enhanced by attention mechanisms.

tools.name: SaProt
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Language Model with Structural Alphabet
tools.detailed_description: A Protein Language Model incorporating a structural alphabet (AA+3Di) for enhanced protein representation and design.

tools.name: pdbcolor
tools.one_line_profile: Color PDB structures based on MSA parameters
tools.detailed_description: Python code to color a PDB structure based on parameters from a multiple sequence alignment, aiding in structural visualization and annotation.

tools.name: LvaHAl
tools.one_line_profile: Discriminative band selection for hyperspectral images
tools.detailed_description: A local-view-assisted discriminative band selection method with hypergraph autolearning for hyperspectral image processing.

tools.name: AccFG
tools.one_line_profile: Functional Group Extraction and Molecular Structure Comparison
tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting functional groups and comparing molecular structures, useful in cheminformatics.
